export
******


Description
===========

Exports an image to the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage
Service. You can use the Object Storage Service URL, or the namespace,
bucket name, and object name when specifying the location to export
to.

For more information about exporting images, see Image Import/Export.

To perform an image export, you need write access to the Object
Storage Service bucket for the image, see Let Users Write Objects to
Object Storage Buckets.

See Object Storage URLs and [pre-authenticated requests] for
constructing URLs for image import/export.


Available Commands
==================

* to-object

* to-object-uri
